name: Paranoid Kid & The Shadow - Rowan Reed - Belle version
name_original: Paranoid Kid & The Shadow - Rowan Reed - Belle version
description:
In this visual novel a boy faces his primordial and sadly oh so common fear of the dark. Paranoia is one hell of a state of mind... or is it? 

Three possible outcomes...

This was a twine game first and I turned it into a VN.

I hope you enjoy.
